name: Kingdom Crisis
description:
Made for GDSG Intrinsic Game Jam - 2nd Edition.  

Requires fullscreen, for some reason I can't figure out.

Theme: difficult communication.  Get reports from your scouts to determine how you would like to distribute your army each day to defend your land from invasion!  But watch out, some reporters do not communicate well,  and others intend to deceive!

Restrictions: Requires only left clicks to play.
